amendatorysection.catchline: Hunters Helping the Hungry Cash Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Hunters Helping the Hungry Cash Fund is created. The fund shall include amounts designated for the fund pursuant to section 37-1504 and revenue received from gifts, grants, bequests, donations, other similar donation arrangements, or other contributions from public or private sources intended for the fund. The fund shall be administered by the commission to carry out the program. The annual expenditures from the fund shall be limited only by the available balance of the fund. The commission shall not be obligated to provide payments from the fund or pay any other expenses in excess of the available balance in the fund. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
